summary: The nearly final installment of the Mo' Monsters Series! Adds about 7000 leveled bandits in different spawn points around skyrim. Requires Mo' Ghosts or Mo' Daedra to function well.
descriptionHtml:
The nearly final installment of the Mo' Monsters Series! Adds about 7000 leveled bandits in different spawn points around skyrim. Requires Mo' Ghosts or Mo' Daedra to function well. This was done as a recommendation by user Walleyjones, so shoot him some thanks or a kudos over at his page:
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/193763-wallyjones/

And while you are at it download the other parts of the Mo' Monsters series:

Mo' Ghosts
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58312/?

Mo' Daedra
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58258/?

Mo' Morrowind Monsters
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58030/?

And Empty Skyrim
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58230/?
author: adrian85858
